I\'m learning new languages with Wudoku!
Fill in the grid with words such that every row, column and 3x3 grid contains one of each of the 9 words translated into the either French or English (depending on the mode that you choose).

If ENGLISH>FRENCH mode is selected, enter the French equivalents of the 9 English words already on the board. If FRENCH->ENGLISH mode is selected, enter the English equivalents of the 9 French words already on the board.
To unlock hints, tap on pre-filled squares of the Sudoku puzzle
The game is complete once all 81 squares have been filled, and the answer has been verified as correct after clicking on the ‘Check Answers’ button
Start playing with our default set of words

Upload your own .csv file using the format: 
 Column 1 - Words in English 
 Column 2 - Words in French 
 and play a game using those words
Choose a language mode to begin your Sudoku puzzle
To practice your listening comprehension \n skills, enable Listening Comprehension \n Mode to proceed with selecting a language.
